1.name: Original
1.description: The original game rules, with 9 colors with 9 pieces each

2.name: 13 colors
2.description: 13 colors with 13 pieces each. Instant win conditions are 13 pieces of one color or 10 pieces of three adjacent colors

3.name: 13-color hex
3.description: The pieces are arranged in a hexagon instead of a square. All rules are the same as the '13 colors' variant, except that you may only take pieces if they have at least three adjacent sides exposed, not two
